# 转换日期列

                'show_cnt', 'click_cnt', 'click_rate', 'convert_cnt', 'convert_rate']

    df[col] = pd.to_numeric(df[col], errors='coerce')

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))

plt.title('编导素材数量分布')
plt.xlabel('编导')
plt.ylabel('素材数量')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig(f'{output_dir}/director_material_count.png')

df['duration'].plot(kind='hist', bins=10, color='salmon', edgecolor='black')
plt.title('素材时长分布')
plt.xlabel('时长(秒)')
plt.ylabel('素材数量')
plt.grid(axis='y', alpha=0.75)
plt.savefig(f'{output_dir}/duration_distribution.png')
plt.close()

# 3. 创建ROI分布图
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
df['pay_order_roi'].plot(kind='hist', bins=8, color='lightgreen', edgecolor='black')
plt.title('ROI分布')
plt.xlabel('ROI')
plt.ylabel('素材数量')
plt.grid(axis='y', alpha=0.75)
plt.savefig(f'{output_dir}/roi_distribution.png')
plt.close()

# 4. 创建Top 5消耗素材对比图
plt.figure(figsize=(12, 7))
top_materials = df.sort_values(by='stat_cost', ascending=False).head(5)
top_materials['material_name_short'] = top_materials['material_name'].str.slice(0, 15) + '...'
top_materials.plot(x='material_name_short', y=['stat_cost', 'pay_order_amount'], kind='bar')
plt.title('Top 5 素材消耗与订单金额对比')
plt.xlabel('素材名称')
plt.ylabel('金额(元)')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.legend(['消耗', '订单金额'])
plt.tight_layout()
plt.savefig(f'{output_dir}/top5_materials_cost.png')
plt.close()

top_convert_rate.plot(x='material_name_short', y=['click_rate', 'convert_rate'], kind='bar')
plt.title('Top 5 素材点击率与转化率对比')

plt.xlabel('编导')
plt.ylabel('平均ROI')
